thread.title: Eminem's daughter, 21, is all grown up – and super hot
thread.title_full: Eminem's daughter, 21, is all grown up – and super hot

title: Eminem's daughter, 21, is all grown up – and super hot
text:
INSTAGRAM ALL GROWN UP: Hailie is now 21 and a total babe 
Hailie Scott was the inspiration behind many of Eminem's, who's real name is Marshall Bruce Mathers III, famous tracks. 
While the beauty appeared in some of the Lose Yourself rapper's music videos as a kid. 
Images of the young lady started floating around last year and the 21-year-old faded away into the background…until now. 
YOUTUBE DADDY'S GIRL: Hailie is definitely all woman now 
The bronde beauty bears a striking resemblance to her dad, with piercing blue eyes. 
With a scorching hot bod to boot, Hailie – who once declared Harry Styles was the love of her life – seems like your typical young adult. 
But unlike most celebrity offspring, Hailie has shunned the limelight in favour of education. 
The all-American girl graduated high school back in 2014 and is now studying psychology at Michigan State University. Eminem through the years – in pictures Tuesday, 7th March 2017 Eminem's career has seen staggering highs and lows – from his monster hit 'Stan' featuring British singer Dido, to his 2001 conviction for firearms offences. We take a look back at the infamous rapper's career 1 / 23 Eminem in concert holding a chainsaw in 2000 
INSTAGRAM ALL-AMERICAN GIRL: Hailie shunned the limelight in favour of education 
The bombshell is the product of the 44-year-old's marriage to Kimberly Scott. 
The two had an extremely on/off relationship getting married and divorced twice. 
Eminem also adopted Kim's daughter Whitney from a previous relationship as well as her niece, Alaina. Rapper Biggie Smalls' RAREST photographs Saturday, 4th February 2017 Ranked as one of the greatest and most influential rappers of all time, the late Notorious B.I.G. aka Biggie Smalls' RAREST photographs 1 / 6 Notorious B.I.G. performing at Meadowlands, New Jersey, 1995 
INSTAGRAM BOMBSHELL: Hailie is studying psychology at Michigan State University 
However despite his tremulous marriage, Eminem credits his daughter for helping him through the toughest times. 
"My daughter comes first no matter what," he said. 
"If there's important things going on in her life that I need to be there for, then I'll drop what I'm doing. 
"Hailie has been my main source of drive, a motivation, especially when she was first born and I didn't have a career, I didn't have money, I didn't have place to live, so I think that really kicked me in the a** harder than anything." Related articles
